conclusion: Analyze the velocity-time graph to determine the direction of motion.
Direction of motion is determined by the sign of the velocity.
The graph shows velocity of a particle moving in a straight line over time.
Negative velocity indicates motion opposite to the positive direction.
Motion direction from 2 to 3 seconds is opposite to the positive direction.
Conclude that motion direction from 2 to 3 seconds is opposite to positive direction.
The motion direction of the particle from 2 to 3 seconds is opposite to the defined positive direction.
